title: Heart of the Dragon
description: Kiana Hughes is an average twenty-five year old, living in a world not so average. Her best friend Kelvin Solis has been her rock, her savior, her everything, and when she suddenly starts to find him as more than a friend, that's when life shifts. Kelvin Solis has been in love with Kiana Hughes his whole life. He'll do anything to protect her from the world he's part of. But Kiana, well, she's feisty and she wants answers as to why he doesn't want to jump the friendship line, even after confessing his love to her. The Bearded Dragons roam... Dangers lurk... Strength is put to the test... Only Kiana can reach the heart of the dragon and bring him solace.
author: Amanda Kay
